The friendly, professional employees of QTS are experts at providing Assisted Transportation or NEMT services. We are specialists in providing safe, reliable and on-time transport for our clients using wheelchairs and stretchers.Whether it is for a dialysis appointment, a routine doctor visit, or a trip to lunch to meet family or friends, QTS passengers appreciate our friendly drivers and clean vehicles.For information regarding our rates, special requirements, or to make a reservation, please call 602.371.1000. We accept future reservations up to 90 days in advance as well as same day ASAP transportation requests at no additional cost.QTS is on the road 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Call anytime for a reservation.Our primary service area is the extended Phoenix metropolitan area, Maricopa County, and the surrounding cities and towns.QTS provides services to hospitals, assisted living facilities, nursing homes and hospices throughout Arizona. We also provide services to anyone who just needs a ride from here to there.

Envoy America is a professional, personal ride service for Seniors. Envoy America is subscription based and combines old fashioned customer service with responsible, friendly, and mature Drivers to get you where you need to go – and safely home again.

Mentor and current President of the Greater Phoenix Chapter of SCORE. SCORE is a nonprofit association dedicated to helping small businesses get off the ground, grow and achieve their goals through education and mentorship. We are celebrating our 50th Anniversary.Because our work is supported by the U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA), and thanks to our network of 11,000+ volunteers, we are able to deliver our services at no charge. Call 602.745.7250 for more information.

At golfmix, our mission is to become an essential “club in the bag” for golfers and the place golfers go to find what they need, share what they want, and build relationships with those who share their interests and values in golf.We know golf is an extremely personal endeavor and while many of us across the globe are united in our love of it, we all have different interests, skill levels, and goals. that diversity is a big part of what makes golf such an intimidating sport for people to try. many of us are only comfortable trying a new course when it comes recommended by a friend.

Lynn Ruby
★ Speaker | Trainer | Consultant ★ Helping businesses understand and implement digital marketing strategies.
April 7, 2015, Lynn worked with Andy in the same group

As a key speaker for the 2nd Annual SCORE 2015 Small Business Symposium, Lynn Ruby did a great job of engaging our audience, sharing real world examples and strategies for email and social media marketing and answered audience questions thoroughly and confidently. We received many attendee comments that her presentation was extremely valuable in helping them understand how to grow and nurture their customer relationships - making specific and actionable recommendations for immediate implementation. I would highly recommend Lynn for speaking engagements. Andy BeranPresidentSCORE Phoenix
